name: Predator and Prey: A Vampire Story
name_original: Predator and Prey: A Vampire Story
description:
You've made a name for yourself as head of the Camarilla's counter-intelligence against the Second Inquisition. But of course, you've made a few rivals in the process. What happens when the hunter becomes the hunted?

 "Predator and Prey: A Vampire Story" is an interactive novel based on Vampire: the Masquerade v5, created for Vampire Jam 2022. This is not an official World of Darkness product and events should not be considered canon.
